con:request.name: createShipment
con:request.con:request:
<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ser="http://demo.oracle.com/ops/domain/services" xmlns:ship="http://demo.oracle.com/ops/domain/services/shipment" xmlns:com="http://demo.oracle.com/ops/domain/schema/common" xmlns:ship1="http://demo.oracle.com/ops/domain/schema/shipping"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <ser:createShipment> <!--Optional:--> <arg0> <ship:RequestHeader> <!--Optional:--> <com:SourceSystem>?</com:SourceSystem> <!--Optional:--> <com:SourceSystemUser>?</com:SourceSystemUser> <!--Optional:--> <com:SourceSystemTxId>?</com:SourceSystemTxId> </ship:RequestHeader> <ship:Shipment> <ship1:ExternalReferenceId>${RequestProperties#ExternalId}</ship1:ExternalReferenceId>
<ship1:ToAddress> <com:Addressee>Jeff West</com:Addressee> <com:AddressLine1>123 Main St</com:AddressLine1> <com:City>Los Angeles</com:City> <com:State>CA</com:State> <com:PostalCode>90036</com:PostalCode> </ship1:ToAddress> <ship1:FromAddress> <com:Addressee>Larry Ellison</com:Addressee> <com:AddressLine1>Oracle HQ</com:AddressLine1> <com:City>Redwood Shores</com:City> <com:State>CA</com:State> <com:PostalCode>12345</com:PostalCode> </ship1:FromAddress> <ship1:ShippingServiceName>?</ship1:ShippingServiceName> <!--1 or more repetitions:--> <ship1:Parcel> <ship1:Contents>stuff</ship1:Contents> <ship1:Height>1</ship1:Height> <ship1:Width>2</ship1:Width> <ship1:Length>3</ship1:Length> <ship1:Weight>4</ship1:Weight> <ship1:ParcelStatus>?</ship1:ParcelStatus> </ship1:Parcel> <ship1:Parcel> <ship1:Contents>more stuff</ship1:Contents> <ship1:Height>1</ship1:Height> <ship1:Width>2</ship1:Width> <ship1:Length>3</ship1:Length> <ship1:Weight>4</ship1:Weight> <ship1:ParcelStatus>?</ship1:ParcelStatus> </ship1:Parcel> </ship:Shipment> </arg0> </ser:createShipment> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>
